recipe.ingredients: - cucumber: 1 medium-sized - fresh mint leaves: 1/4 cup - fresh lemon juice: 2 tablespoons - water: 8 cups - ice cubes: 1 cup (optional) - lemon slices (for garnish): 3-4 slices
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Thinly slice the cucumber and roughly chop the mint leaves. 2. Combine in Pitcher: Place the cucumber slices, mint leaves, and lemon slices (if using) in a large pitcher. 3. Add Water: Pour water into the pitcher and stir gently. 4. Infuse: Add the fresh lemon juice and stir again. If you want a colder beverage instantly, add ice cubes to the pitcher. 5. Chill and Infuse: Refrigerate the infused water for at least 2 hours, allowing the flavors to meld. For a stronger infusion, refrigerate overnight. 6. Serve: Pour the infused water into glasses, making sure to include a few cucumber and lemon slices, as well as some mint leaves for garnish and added flavor.
